messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a world with 16 rooms. Room 1 is connected to rooms 2, 3, 4, and 7. Room 2 is connected to rooms 1, 3, 4, and 16. Room 3 is connected to rooms 1, 2, 4 and 5. Room 4 is also connected to rooms 1, 2, 3, and 14. Room 5 is connected to rooms 6, 7, 8, and 3. Room 6 is connected to rooms 5, 7, 8, and 12. Room 7 is connected to rooms 1, 8, 6, and 5. Room 8 is also connected to rooms 5, 6, 7, and 10. Room 9 is connected to rooms 10, 11,12, and 15. Room 10 is connected to rooms 9, 11, 8, and 12. Room 11 is connected to rooms 13, 9, 12, and 10. Room 12 is also connected to rooms 9, 10, 11, and 6. Room 13 is connected to rooms 14, 15, 16, and 11. Room 14 is connected to rooms 4, 13, 15, 16. Room 15 is connected to rooms 13, 14, 16, and 9. Room 16 is also connected to rooms 13, 14, 15, and 2. You have been told that there is a chest with a reward of 50 in room 10 and there is a chest with a reward of 10 in room 15. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

Hello! Happy to help! First let's list rooms connected to the starting room 1; rooms 2, 3, 1, 7. With one or more awards chess present at this point I strongly suggest listing room connected rooms only once and will order these starting room by chest awarded for more clarity - let me list; starting our way finder

Step one: from a room you get initial most reward from by my reasoning you're most greeded individual in the building you pick that room you enter so pick your shorted way in the direction you travel room entrance to that entry point and room  with a max  associated cash RED award.( room no);  Now tell I room we travel here associated cash amount. I  am listening! Take your order to travel, the doors now will allow (rooms numbers), after collect your pick for the one chEst location re enter ( rooms available as you now control key card), and reorder the rest with new possible direction (for possible new highest cash awards on one hand) or go another way associated connected entry, remember rules, go ahead sir! Your room travel pick from list based from associated max reard for entry please follow my next list by each number that I will post. You order now or type, (go from start - stop), room  selection (first or  all). Please go to control which of (entry) (next set(list).

step asisits

Assistant: Let proceed forward together. Here are my list, starting path; initial Room seT ( room #, reward information like min and associated cased) entryway I un locked associated with order below

Now you have been told that the reward of the chest in  room 15 has been changed to 60. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward?
